title: AWS Amazon S3 to AWS Lambda Image Resizing
description: Create a Lambda function that resizes images uploaded to S3.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: A Lambda function consumes events from an Amazon S3 bucket. The Lambda code checks the uploaded file is an image and creates a thumbnail version of the image in the destination bucket.
This pattern deploys a Lambda function and two S3 buckets.
